```{r libraryLoad,include=FALSE}
hrm::hrmAttach()
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r loadData,echo=FALSE}
load('../data/exampleFIEworkflowResults.RData')
```

## Quality Control

```{r RSD,echo=FALSE}
suppressMessages(analysis %>%
  resultsAnalysis() %>%
  plotRSD()
  )
```

```{r PCA,echo=FALSE}
analysis %>%
  resultsAnalysis() %>%
  plotPCA()
```

```{r LDA,echo=FALSE}
analysis %>%
  resultsAnalysis() %>%
  plotLDA()
```


## Classification

```{r classificationPlot,echo=FALSE}
analysis %>%
  resultsAnalysis() %>%
  plotClassification()
```

## Feature Selection

```{r featureSelection, echo=FALSE}
analysis %>%
  resultsAnalysis() %>%
  plotFeatureSelection()
```

```{r explanatoryHeatmap,echo=FALSE}
analysis %>%
  resultsAnalysis() %>% 
  plotExplanatoryHeatmap() 
```
